    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init​(java.io.File nativeFile)
        Loads the given file and creates the bindings in WgpuJNI. It will then setup the log with the default log callback, and a log level of WARN.

      • setWgpuLogLevel

        public static void setWgpuLogLevel​(WgpuLogLevel level)
        Sets the log level for the Rust wgpu library.
        Parameters:
        level - the minimum level to log

      • getWgpuNativeVersion

        public static java.lang.String getWgpuNativeVersion()
        returns a string of the Wgpu-native library version in the format "major.minor.patch"

      • createLongArrayPointer

        public static jnr.ffi.Pointer createLongArrayPointer​(long[] longs)
        Wraps a series of long values in a pointer in direct memory.

      • createByteArrayPointer

        public static jnr.ffi.Pointer createByteArrayPointer​(byte[] bytes)
        Copies the given data into a DirectByteBuffer and then returns the buffer's pointer
        See Also:
        ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(int)

      • createNullPointer

        public static jnr.ffi.Pointer createNullPointer()
        returns a null pointer

      • createByteBufferPointer

        public static jnr.ffi.Pointer createByteBufferPointer​(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        returns the pointer to the provided byte buffer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if buffer isn't using direct memory, or buffer.position != 0

      • createDirectPointer

        public static jnr.ffi.Pointer createDirectPointer​(int size)
        a pointer in direct memory with the given size
        Parameters:
        size - (in bytes) space allocated for the pointer

      • getRuntime

        public static jnr.ffi.Runtime getRuntime()
